modName: Oversoul Restoration Now Heals Undead Plus a Few New Spells
summary: Oversoul makes it so you can heal undead, daedra and automatons with any restoration spell. Secondly this mod adds a few new balanced restoration spells to the game on leveled vendor lists.
descriptionHtml:
Oversoul makes it so you can heal undead, daedra and automatons with any restoration spell.

Secondly this mod adds a few new balanced restoration spells to the game on leveled vendor lists. All spell vendors should have lower level spells.
Higher level restoration spells are only sold by Collete however.

There shouldn't be any glitches or problems, and this mod shouldn't require any DLC.
The only annoyance is that the some of the new spells appear to be wrong skill levels ( i.e, new adept spell appearing as expert skill level.)
The spells still count as the correct skill level and have appropriate perks though so just ignore it.
author: pyrotx
